reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm Ready~Great Quality here
reviews.reviewText: I'm so surprised by this coat. it's a true Denim Jacket/Coat. The Quality is heavy, not a skimpy fabric it's real denim. I was surprised again, I got more than expected out of this jacket. I fit it perfect, I have big boobs G, and I can button this up and not feel squeezed into it, I got a 4x cause I wasn't sure, a 3x would have been tight, the sleeve is a little long on me but no problem, Love it, Buy it. I hate wasting money on clothes you see online but again I got a great surprise in this jacket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all round coat!
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat! I normally wear a large, but ordered an xl for shrinkage. It did shrink a little, but I may have still been ok with a large. It washed beautifully, I use wool balls in the dryer and it was wrinkle free! I bought it to wear when I go teach fitness classes for coverage, work out clothes are not warm in the wind and cold. This is warm enough for 40-60 degree weather and I use it a lot. I feel like I can stop by the store in it after working out and still look decent. I can also wear it for casual or even semi dressy occasions like a date with heels and it's nice looking. I was pleasantly surprised and may order another when I have lost weight because now I can't be without this coat! I wear it a lot more often than I expected, especially since I don't need to iron it! Great weight material!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fall Jacket
reviews.reviewText: I don’t typically buy clothing from Amazon, but I saw someone with a long denim jacket, and I started Googling. I decided to take a chance on this jacket, and I LOVE it! It’s comfortable, fashionable. The weight is perfect. Substantial denim, not cheap. Looks great with all sorts of outfits. I am 5’6”, 152 and bought a medium. Buy this! You won’t be sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Made well, long, order up if you like it oversized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this dungaree coat. Fits a little long in the sleeves…but I LOVE it. I’ve gotten several compliments when I’ve worn it. Great look, great price. Don’t hesitate to buy one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Length is perfect.
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Perfect fit for a short person. Very satisfied. Can't wait to wear it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an awesome jacket
reviews.reviewText: This is an absolutely wonderful jacket with nice roomy pockets! Not of thin fabric at all and goes with so many wardrobe options! You can dress this up or dress it down. My only complaint (and it’s minor) is that the buttons are very loose and kind of noisy when walking around. None have fallen off yet but I’m expecting it to happen soon. Outside of that, the size recommended was perfect (I sized up for a looser look) and it looks exactly how it’s pictured. Happy customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buttons on the wrong side!
reviews.reviewText: I love the appearance, weight, and fit of the jacket. Looks well made. However, there is no fiber content on the labels so I am unsure how to launder. The smell is very strong, but this is not unusual for dark denim so it should diminish once it is washed and airs out. But the buttons on the right side - like a man’s jacket - will drive me crazy so I don’t know yet if I will keep it. None of the photos in the ad nor in the posted reviews show the buttons on the wrong side so it was a surprise to find it this way. Also, it is not roomy enough to wear a sweater beneath it so I might decide to give it another try with a size larger.I am 5’4”, 230 lb, and busty. I bought the XXL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks just like the picture.I am size 12/14 and brought a medium which fits well.Love it
Runs big so go down a size
Esta muy padre pero esta muy pesada.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nicely made but very long sleeves
reviews.reviewText: This fit at least two sizes smaller than the measurements would lead one to expect so I had to order the largest size 4-5X rather than my usual 2X.The larger size fits nicely and the coat is very well made with a good quality stout denim but the sleeves are too long. I’m 5’4” tall and have longer arms than the average woman does but the upper edge of the cuff extends to my fingertips, so the cuff itself is entirely past the tips of my fingers.I can roll them up but I will have to get them shortened because the denim is fairly thick and the rolled up part is too thick and heavy.Overall it’s a really nice coat and I like it very much but the sizing is a problem and the sleeves would be too long even if I was much taller than I am.
